mods.abstract: Palmettos fastened on stakes are stuck into bedding ground, the conchs climbing on to the palmettoes to lay their eggs. Fishermen make daily trips, taking up the stakes shaking the attached conchs into their skiffs and destroying them.

titleInfo.title: Louisiana Sea Grant Digital Images Collection
